svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Unadjusted gender gap in median earnings of full-time workers (%)
The gender wage gap is unadjusted and is defined as the difference between median earnings of men and women
relative to median earnings of men. Data refer to full-time employees and to self-employed.
